parameters.description: Chapter data (number omitted for oneshot manga)
parameters.name: body

409.description: Duplicate chapter number or oneshot already has a chapter

post.description: Replaces all pages in the chapter. Files inside the ZIP are sorted by filename. An optional metadata.json at the ZIP root is parsed and returned as suggestions.
For oneshot manga only. Auto-creates the chapter (number=0), uploads pages, sets the first page as cover if none exists, and returns metadata suggestions from an optional metadata.json in the ZIP.

400.description: Not a oneshot or invalid ZIP
